Original: 雖然是新開的酒吧。但酒品食物都在水準之上。調酒創新又美味，不同酒感跟口味的都有。還搭配適合的音樂，只差香味就是五感俱全的五星級調酒啦😍 調酒師們也很專業又可愛，很認真的介紹不同酒品。是來古亭一定要試試看的酒吧名單。
EN: Although it is a new bar.But wine and food are above the standard.Into the bartending innovation and delicious, different wines and tastes.It is also paired with suitable music. Only the five -star bartender is also very professional and cute, and he also introduces different wines.It is the list of bars that must be tried to come to ancient pavilion.

Original:
喜歡這裡的裝潢、擺設

EN:
Like the decoration and furnishings here
The bartending is named after the name of the song, and the menu is designed with vinyl records
It is very special that there is a glass of bartending called braised pork rice. Now I think it is really braised pork rice
As soon as I ask it, it is really wine! The taste of bartender is pretty good ~~

The waiters are very kind and good to chat

On the whole, the atmosphere is good, and the music will not be too loud
The store is located in the basement, and there is a mystery of entering the cave
Unfortunately, the fried objects are not sold that day. I hope that next time I can try their frying objects
